sentences.sContent: At the gate of the Exhibition, Mr. Khrushchev voiced a gibe about the United States ban on the shipment of strategic goods to the Soviet Union.
sentences.sContent_eng: At the gate of the Exhibition, Mr. Khrushchev voiced a gibe about the United States ban on the shipment of strategic goods to the Soviet Union.
sentences.sCn: 在展览馆大门口，赫鲁晓夫先生以嘲弄的口气抗议美国针对苏联的战略物资禁运。
